title: Israel's Top Court Rules Army Must Draft Ultra-Orthodox Jewish Students
content: Israel's Supreme Court ruled on Tuesday that the government must draft ultra-Orthodox Jewish seminary students to the conscript military, a decree likely to send shockwaves through Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's coalition.
summary: Israel's Supreme Court ruled on Tuesday that the government must draft ultra-Orthodox Jewish seminary students to the conscript military, a decree likely to send shockwaves through Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's coalition.

title: Illegal Hajj Routes Claim Hundreds of Lives: A Grave Warning to Pilgrims
content: Hundreds of people died during this year's Hajj pilgrimage due to the extreme heat in Mecca with temperatures soaring past 50 degrees Celsius.
summary: Hundreds of people died during this year's Hajj pilgrimage due to the extreme heat in Mecca with temperatures soaring past 50 degrees Celsius.

title: Israeli Airstrikes Kill 24 In Gaza As Tanks Deepen Incursion Into Rafah
content: Israeli forces killed at least 24 Palestinians in three separate airstrikes on Gaza City early on Tuesday, health officials said, while tanks deepened their incursion into the town of Rafah in the south of the enclave.
summary: Israeli forces killed at least 24 Palestinians in three separate airstrikes on Gaza City early on Tuesday, health officials said, while tanks deepened their incursion into the town of Rafah in the south of the enclave.

title: Singapore HR Jailed For Giving Herself $148,000 In Unauthorised Pay Raise
content: A human resource employee in Singapore has been jailed for 18 months for making bogus pay claims for herself involving $148,000.
summary: A human resource employee in Singapore has been jailed for 18 months for making bogus pay claims for herself involving $148,000.

title: Watch: China Probe Carrying Samples From Far Side Of Moon Returns To Earth
content: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe landed on Tuesday in the northern Chinese region of Inner Mongolia, making the country the first to bring back samples from the moon's far side.
summary: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe landed on Tuesday in the northern Chinese region of Inner Mongolia, making the country the first to bring back samples from the moon's far side.

title: Opinion: Greater Expectations: Why China Is Going Nuclear 'Faster Than Ever'
content: As per the US Defense Department's estimate, China will likely have over 1,000 operational warheads by 2030.

title: After Brad Pitt's Children, Tom Cruise's Daughter Suri Drops Father's Name
content: Suri Cruise, the daughter of Hollywood icons Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes, has dropped her father's surname.
summary: Suri Cruise, the daughter of Hollywood icons Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes, has dropped her father's surname.

title: Need Chinese Students In Humanities, Indian For Sciences: US Diplomat
content: The US should welcome more students from China, but to study the humanities rather than sciences, the second-ranked US diplomat said on Monday
summary: The US should welcome more students from China, but to study the humanities rather than sciences, the second-ranked US diplomat said on Monday

title: A Look At Candidates Competing For Iran's Presidential Vote This Week
content: Iranians will choose between mostly hardline candidates in an early presidential election on June 28 following the death of Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash last month.
summary: Iranians will choose between mostly hardline candidates in an early presidential election on June 28 following the death of Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash last month.

title: North Korea Sends More Trash-Filled Balloons Towards South Korea
content: North Korea has sent hundreds more trash-filled balloons southward, Seoul's military said Tuesday, the latest in a series of border barrages that have sparked a tit-for-tat propoganda campaign.
summary: North Korea has sent hundreds more trash-filled balloons southward, Seoul's military said Tuesday, the latest in a series of border barrages that have sparked a tit-for-tat propoganda campaign.

title: US Woman Vanishes In Bahamas While Attending Yoga Retreat
content: A 41-year-old US woman has been missing since last week after she travelled to the Bahamas to attend a yoga retreat.

title: 'Great Resignation' Not Over Yet: Understanding The Phenomenon
content: At least 28% of workers globally are planning to switch jobs over the next year, a new survey has revealed.

title: Woman Stumbles Off Treadmill, Falls Out Of Gym Window In Indonesia

title: Apple Rejects Meta's Initiative For AI Partnership: Report
content: Apple has rejected overtures by Meta Platforms to integrate the social networking company's AI chatbot into the iPhone months ago, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.
summary: Apple has rejected overtures by Meta Platforms to integrate the social networking company's AI chatbot into the iPhone months ago, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.

title: Explained: Why Julian Assange Is Flying To Remote Pacific Island Of Saipan
content: Julian Assange is en route to a courtroom on the Pacific island of Saipan where he is expected to plead guilty on Wednesday to a single criminal charge in a plea deal that will see him walk free after a 14-year legal odyssey.
summary: Julian Assange is en route to a courtroom on the Pacific island of Saipan where he is expected to plead guilty on Wednesday to a single criminal charge in a plea deal that will see him walk free after a 14-year legal odyssey.

title: From Village To Glastonbury, Indonesia's All-Girl Metal Band Makes History
content: When three Indonesian teen girls formed a metal band 10 years ago to sing about gender equality and peace over bone-crunching guitars and drums, they could scarcely have dreamed of one day playing at Glastonbury.
summary: When three Indonesian teen girls formed a metal band 10 years ago to sing about gender equality and peace over bone-crunching guitars and drums, they could scarcely have dreamed of one day playing at Glastonbury.

title: "Netanyahu Is Danger To Israel": Ex Spy Handler Of Hamas Co-Founder's Son
content: On a Tel Aviv overpass, former spy Gonen Ben Itzhak addresses a small gathering of flag-waving protesters worried about the future of Israel under longest-serving premier Benjamin Netanyahu.

title: Millionaire Banker Who Punched Woman At New York Pride Event Quits Job

title: 21-Year-Old Arrested For Murdering Indian Man During Robbery At US Store
content: Police in the US state of Texas have arrested a man in connection with the killing of a 32-year-old Indian national during a robbery at a convenience store in Dallas.
summary: Police in the US state of Texas have arrested a man in connection with the killing of a 32-year-old Indian national during a robbery at a convenience store in Dallas.
